phase3.listeners.CreateNewImageListener



interface CreateNewImageListener;
This listener is fired whenever the user clicks the create Button in the NewDialog.

Authors:
Zachery Burris (zburris@uncc.edu) and Richard Voelker (rvoelker@uncc.edu)

Date:
April 22, 2014

abstract void onCreateNewImage(int width, int height);
Called whenever the NewDialog confirms an imag creation.

Params:
int width The width of the image.
int height The height of the image.

Date:
April 22, 2014
